I graduated from Oberlin College and Conservatory with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science. I am currently pursuing a Master’s degree in Robotics at Northwestern University.

My main interests include:

  • modular robots
  • robot swarms
  • bio-inspired systems
  • wearable devices
